definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Hours later the royal charter received the queen's assent.
sentences.chinese: 幾個小時之後，皇家特許狀獲得了女王的應允。

sentences.english: They claim the royal charter amounts to government meddling.
sentences.chinese: 他們聲稱皇家特許狀就相當於政府幹預。
他取消我們的許多特許狀。
1837年給學校頒發了王室特許狀。

sentences.english: The University of London was established by Royal Charter in 1836.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦大學年獲得皇家特許狀後於1836成立。

sentences.english: A charter was granted to the town many years ago.
sentences.chinese: 該市鎮多年前已獲得特許狀。
